alert.note: Alert for Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 4:27PM MST until September 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... Southeastern Imperial County in southeastern California... * Until 500 PM MST/500 PM PDT/. * At 426 PM MST/426 PM PDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winterhaven, or near Yuma, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Yuma, Fortuna Foothills, Winterhaven and Araby. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 1 and 13. CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 92 and 96. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 29 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
